com.esri.svr.ejb
Class ServiceCatalogBeanBMP

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.svr.cat.BaseCatalog
        |
        +--com.esri.svr.ejb.ServiceCatalogBean
              |
              +--com.esri.svr.ejb.ServiceCatalogBeanBMP
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, javax.ejb.EntityBean, Serializable
public class ServiceCatalogBeanBMP
extends ServiceCatalogBean

This class provides full implementations of ServiceCatalogLocal and ServiceCatalogLocalHome interfaces as a BMP (Bean Managed Persistence).

See Also:
Serialized Form
